entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain or light snow changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 2 except 8 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
